llm_res.rule: transferFrom Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism. Note Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event. The function should return true on success.

Clients SHOULD make sure to create user interfaces in such a way that they set the allowance first to 0 before setting it to another value for the same spender. THOUGH The contract itself shouldn’t enforce it, to allow backwards compatibility with contracts deployed before.
